remarks: Multiplicative inverse function for a division ring.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2014.)
statement:
invrfval.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
invrfval.g $e |- G = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) $.
invrfval.i $e |- I = ( invr ` R ) $.
invrfval $p |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
